name: Candy Jump - The New Age
description:
You are about to embark on a journey of conquering the "Candy World." You'll meet Red Dragons and other obstacles along the way.

Your mission is to jump as high as possible and collect as much as candies as you can. The more candies you collect the better, because they can unlock special upgrades, more jumpers and other unknown worlds.

Here's what you'll encounter:

- Candy Magnet - this is a special item that will bring all candies to you for a certain amount of time. When you get the candy magnet, you'll be able to collect a lot more candies as usual. This special item can be upgraded as we speak and used at your advantage.

- Power Jump - this is the ability to jump much higher than usual. You'll be equipped with "alien-like" powers to boost jumps. This would happen only if you get the Power Jump artifact.

- You'll have more than 10 jumpers to choose from. Each would have special abilities others will not possess. Choose wisely.

- There are 3 worlds to choose from. Each has its own dangers and obstacles, but with enough courage and experience, you can master all three.

- Red dragons. They are your enemy. Stay away from them as much as possible.

You have the ability to show off on Facebook. You can post your best score and make friends envy you. It's your time now! Let's have fun!

Grab your copy now!
